availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James W. Lockridge (Hickman County, Kentucky, attorney)

body.p: Hickman County, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Married to America L. Howard Lockridge in Christian County, Kentucky, on August 14, 1859. Father of Ella Lockridge. Attorney in Hickman County, Kentucky, in 1860. Employed one enslaved person in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Clinton, p. 60.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, p. 208B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Christian County Marriages, Film #000465564, p. 262.
